topic.title: Additional WebHelp Plugin Parameters for DITA

body.p: In case you need to further customize the transformation process, you are able to append other DITA-OT parameters as well. Any parameter that you want to append must follow the -D model of the above parameters. For example, to append the args.hdr parameter, use:-Dargs.hdr=/path/to/directory/of/header-file.htmlwhere /path/to/directory/of/header-file.html is the location of the directory that contains the header file.
